title: Mouse and keyboard being out of control in a game
body:
Since last week I noticed that, when I press some key, there was no response at that moment, but several minutes later, I could see the effect. I know this was lag.
But weird thing happened, the keyboard is working well while I lost control of the mouse cursor. The cursor was not moving smoothly when I was moving my mouse, in the worse case, I couldn't move it and I couldn't see it at all, while the keyboard response was perfect. Then can you say that this was a lag? The keyboard response was instantly, it was not a typical lag. 
Just wonder do you guys have ever run into this kind of problem. I doubt there is something wrong with my hardware, but I can't believe it, because it's perfect when I play other games.

replies.body: I was using mac for league after I update to s8 My mouse was out of control every game, It was running around all over my screen
Have similar problems in last 2 weeks.  Not always, but sometimes the mouse just become out of control.  Last game I played, was lucky this did not happened until the nexus was destroyed.

It's really important to determine if this is being caused by some kind of input delay caused by a connection problem, or a corrupt configuration.  As a first step, try resetting your config:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

If the issue persists, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to see if there are any issues with your network connecting to our game servers.  Let me know!
